name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
This course will help students design, plan, organize, and edit an independent research project.
本課程將幫助學生設計、規劃、組織和編輯一個獨立的研究專案。
schedule:
Proposal and Outline      Due:  first week of semester 
 
Analysis of a scene       Due:  beginning of March  
 
 Draft Chapter 1          Due:  end of March 
 
 Draft Chapter 2          Due:  end of April 
 
 Draft Chapter 3          Due:  end of May 

 Draft Chapter 4          Due:  end of June
materials: assigned readings related to project top
